original_text: When it was almost evening, Jesus' disciples came to speak to him. They said to him, ‘We are in a place where there are no houses. It will soon be dark. Send the crowd away now, so that they can go to the villages near here. Then they can buy some food for themselves to eat.’
korean_text: 저녁이 되매 제자들이 나아와 이르되 이 곳은 빈 들이요 때도 이미 저물었으니 무리를 보내어 마을에 들어가 먹을 것을 사 먹게 하소서

sentences.original_text: Jesus' disciples came to speak to him
'We are in a place where there are no houses
so that they can go to the villages near here
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들이 이 근처 마을로 갈 수 있게 하십시오

sentences.original_text: Then they can buy some food for themselves to eat'
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들은 먹을 음식을 살 수 있습니다'
